title: Bug 6009 - New Class Wizard Doesn't Set Enclosing Type by Default for Nested Classes
description: This bug report addresses a problem related to the New Class Wizard's behavior when creating nested classes.
OB: The observed behavior and expected behavior are not explicitly mentioned in the report, making it unclear what exactly is wrong with the New Class Wizard's handling of nested classes.
EB: The expected behavior is also not clearly stated in the report. It should specify what the New Class Wizard should do when creating nested classes.
SR: To improve this report, it should include clear steps to reproduce the issue, such as which options to select and what actions to take to demonstrate the problem.
